price: Dis : "Si ce que vous voulez hâter dépendait de moi, ce serait affaire faite entre vous et moi." Et c’est Allah qui connaît le mieux les injustes.
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ أَنَّ عِندِي مَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِهِۦ لَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law anna ʿindī mā tastaʿjilūna bihi laquḍiya al-amru baynī wabaynakum wal-lahu aʿlamu bil-ẓālimīna
